text: [Ej mu'minon, holo ki haqiqati duşmanii jahudijon ʙarojaton oşkor gardid] Ojo umed dored, ki ʙa [oini] şumo imon ʙijovarand, ʙo in ki gurūhe az [ulamoi] onon suxanoni Allohro [dar Tavrot] meşunidand va pas az fahmidanaş [alfozu maonii] onro tahrif mekardand, hol on ki [az ʙuzurgii gunohi xeş] ittilo' doştand
